dc_title_s: Infrastructure Report Geodatabase - Pipelines permitted as of December 2012: Pennsylvania
dc_description_s: Pipelines permitted through a DCNR natural gas lease or developed on state forest lands where DCNR does not own the mineral rights. This dataset was used in part to develop the Bureau of Forestrys Shale Gas Monitoring Report (released April 2014). This dataset represents pipelines where construction has been started or completed before December 31, 2012 and permitted through a DCNR natural gas lease or developed on state forest lands where DCNR does not own the mineral rights.Pipeline Type Code Values: 1=Gathering, 2=Marketing, 3=Water, 4=Other or Unknown, 5=Meter/Valve/Tap, 6=Trunk. April 2014 Shale Gas Monitoring Report Infrastructure
dc_creator_sm: Pennsylvania Department of Conservation and Natural Resources
